broadwick.data

Class H2Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.data.H2Database
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseImpl, AutoCloseable

    public final class H2Database
extends Object
implements DatabaseImpl
    Implementation of a H2 database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • H2Database

        public H2Database(String dbName)
        Create a new H2 database instance for a given database name. If the database does not exist one is created.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the name of the database to which we will connect.

      • H2Database

        public H2Database(String dbName,
          boolean deleteDb)
        Create a new H2 database instance for a given database name. If the database does not exist one is created, if one exists and the deleteDb is true then the contents of the database are deleted.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the name of the database to which we will connect.
        deleteDb - delete the contents of the database once a connection is made.
